btrplace.model

Interface Model

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable, ElementBuilder
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultModel, SubModel

    public interface Model
extends Cloneable, ElementBuilder
    A model depicts a consistent snapshot of an infrastructure. Basically, a model is composed by a Mapping to indicate the state and the location of the elements, and a variety of ModelView to provide additional data about the elements.

    In addition, it is possible to declare attributes for specific elements.

    Author:
    Fabien Hermenier

      • getView

        ModelView getView(String id)
        Get a view already attached to the model
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the view if it was attached, null otherwise

      • getViews

        Collection<ModelView> getViews()
        Get all the view attached to the model.
        Returns:
        a collection of views that may be empty.

      • attach

        boolean attach(ModelView v)
        Attach a view to the model. No view with the same identifier must have been attached earlier.
        Parameters:
        v - the view to attach
        Returns:
        true iff the view has been attached

      • detach

        boolean detach(ModelView v)
        Detach a view from this model.
        Parameters:
        v - the view
        Returns:
        true iff the view was removed
